* The value outside the parentheses indicates the percentage of fracture risk in the following 10 years.\n\nNote: the range inside the parentheses is not an estimate of confidence, but is a consequence of the different weight of the risk factors.
World Health Organization (WHO). FRAX®. Fracture Risk Assessment Tool. http://www.sheffield.ac.uk/FRAX/index.jsp?lang=sp
